laboratory_examinations.findings: Confirmed mild to severe left sensorineural hearing loss.
Demonstrated hemorrhage in the left labyrinth.
Revealed bilateral renal cell carcinomas, renal cysts, and pancreatic cysts.
Revealed hemangioblastomas of the medullary obex and thoracic spinal cord.
Revealed complete tumor removal and cyst resolution.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient's brainstem signs and symptoms resolved.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Revealed stable renal cysts, RCC, and pancreatic cysts.

laboratory_examinations.date: Eighteen months after ELST resection (19 months after initial NIH evaluation)
laboratory_examinations.findings: Revealed development of a peritumoral cyst associated with the obex hemangioblastoma.
